The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 03 July is 45,178 (5,207 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 28 June, there were 972 new confirmed cases (112.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 21 June, there were 530 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 83% (442 extra cases).
